website_summaries.verdict: Sharp sunglasses made more for style than sports. Dark color options rank as a popular choice.
pros: All-plastic frame and lenses ensure a lightweight fit that you'll love when wearing these sunglasses for hours
Features 100% UV protection in the lenses
Borrows its design and style from the 1980s
Multiple color options available in both the frame and in the lenses, ensuring you can find just the right look for your tastes
cons: Expensive pair of sunglasses, depending on the color and lens type selected

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sunglasses! Came with a nice oversized hard Oakley ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sunglasses! Came with a nice oversized hard Oakley case and protective sleeve. I absolutely love these! The frame is sturdy and the fit is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie H.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great design
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, design, and they are comfortable. They need darker lenses and grip so they don't slide when sweating.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Oakley Forehand
customer_reviews.text: We have many Oakley glasses in the house and cars, wife loves these glasses...
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Old style with an amazing look and feel. Love them. Chrissy in AZ
customer_reviews.author: DanChrissy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these glasses. I bought them in tortoise too. They aren't too big or too smal.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great Oakley Sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Great Oakley Forehand Sunglasses! Bought these for my daughter and they fit so good! My daughter loves them! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Perfect color, perfect fit, fun and sporty!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective or really poor quality. Oakley won't honor warranty.
customer_reviews.text: My black frames went cloudy white in several areas within 6 months. It doesn't wash off. Defective or really poor quality. Haven't found warranty information on how to get them replaced. (Update below on Oakley refusing to replace/repair)
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy
customer_reviews.text: Love the color the comfort I run with these all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Zuzel

customer_reviews.title: Oakley Forehand's Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my wife, an she absolutely loves them. They are the real thing too, someone had mentioned previously that they weren't
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Watson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glasses!
customer_reviews.text: These are so well made and so very cute, feminine. THere is nothing I don't like about them except that they don't have a gps locator for when I lose them (this is my second pair of these, had the tortoise last time and LOVED them, I like to Rose wash just as much)
customer_reviews.author: J-bo

customer_reviews.title: Love these sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses! They are light weight and have just the right amount of tint for everyday wear. The frames are a great rose color.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Adele

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Product is a fake SKU numbers on the glasses that arrived don't match up and I cannot get the manufacturer 2 year warranty because of this.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very fashionable and comfortable! My first pair of Oakley's and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not this color
customer_reviews.text: The color is not this light it is more a plum color. But is still looking good
customer_reviews.author: sieg klotz

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Glasses never fit my face, but I took a chance. Glad I did. Super cute, nice case, great color (the steel grey/blue). I thought about ordering a second pair as soon as I put them on my face!
customer_reviews.author: alycia brehm

customer_reviews.title: Oakley is great
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for....enough said. She loves them and I am the hero now. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: CaptRic

customer_reviews.title: fabulous as always expected!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty neat white packaging (leather case like a hand purse, white cleansing bag). Urban style lightweight not too striking. Sober sunglasses. Perfect as a gift to my wife!
customer_reviews.author: yanacona

customer_reviews.title: Donald Trump Murders 3rd World Infant!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a dude, bought these for myself. There awesome. They look kinda basic, but i ride motorcycles, and they're nice in the helmet, and are better sun glare protection than the cheapees.
customer_reviews.author: MrPauley

customer_reviews.title: They're really pretty and unique
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sunglasses in the Rose Wash color. They're really pretty and unique! I have a black pair of Oakley Forehand sunglasses purchased directly from Oakley, and these appear to be the same ... same look, weight, feel, fit and writing on the inside. These appear to me to be authentic. I purchased these from Extreme Supply (fulfilled through amazon). I cannot vouch for other vendors, but I had a good experience with Extreme Supply. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel28

customer_reviews.title: Not as Girly as my previous sunglasses...
customer_reviews.text: but I still love them! Look great, fit comfortably, and they were great price!
customer_reviews.author: CubsFanTN

customer_reviews.title: chic sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh these are just posh, looks good to.
customer_reviews.author: Felix, Trinidad

customer_reviews.title: I love the glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love the glasses, but I am a tad concerned that there are no markings on the inside with the name of the glasses. Is this because they are MPH? Or are these not authentic?
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Wish the lense color was slightly darker
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are so cute! Very comfortable. Wish the lense color was slightly darker.. But other than that... Loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Darneal

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again in multiple colors!
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful fit. It is very light weight and does not slip off your face. The brown gradient lenses are nice because everything is still so clear when you look through them, it's not an obnoxious brown color when you look through.
customer_reviews.author: Miyella

product_meta.title: Oakley Forehand Sunglasses - Women's
product_meta.description: The Oakley Forehand Women's Sunglasses are a perfect choice whether you're playing a match or having drinks courtside. Vintage '80s styling with a slightly sportier shape gives it a look that seamlessly blends fashion and function, and Plutonite lenses ensure you're always seeing clearly.
